Text:
Thanks. Great hriller-horror movie. Often I'm disappointed of the plot, this time, except for one or two ridicule scenes, it is a great movie. And frightening too, I had to stop the movie and check my door, I heard some noise you know and... hum well. lol ;) Nice quality, audio in english. English subs in a SSA file. Just load it inside VLC for example. If you want SRT:

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3497859/the-ruins-en
